com.percussion.pso.jexl
Class PSOObjectFinder

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.extension.PSJexlUtilBase
      com.percussion.pso.jexl.PSOObjectFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.extension.IPSExtension, com.percussion.extension.IPSJexlExpression, IPSOObjectFinder
public class PSOObjectFinder
extends com.percussion.extension.PSJexlUtilBase
implements IPSOObjectFinder, com.percussion.extension.IPSJexlExpression

JEXL function for locating various legacy objects by GUID. These functions are commonly available in the Java API, but not directly accessible in JEXL.

Author:
davidbenua

getWorkflowState

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Get the workflow info for a given item",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="stateId",description="the stateId"),@IPSJexlParam(name="workflowAppId",description="Returns the State definition for the specified workflow state.")})
public com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSState getWorkflowState(String stateId,
                                                                                                              String workflowAppId)
Returns a PSState object for the given state and workflow. This can be used to get the publishable flag on a given workflow state. For Example: $summary = $user.psoObjectFinder.getComponentSummary($sys.assemblyItem.getId()) $state = $user.psoObjectFinder.getWorkflowState($summary.getContentStateId(),$summary.getWorkflowAppId())

STATE CURRENT VALUE=${state.getContentValidValue()}

Parameters:
stateId -
workflowAppId -
Returns:
